title: Create a one-command installer
description: Users should be able to install the VSM with a single command like 'curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/turlockmike/vsm/main/install.sh | bash'. The installer should: check prerequisites (python3, claude CLI with auth), clone the repo, set up the worktree structure, create the cron job, initialize state, send a welcome email. Make it dead simple.
